item.title: Azure WAF tuning with AD B2C applications
item.description: Azure Active Directory B2C (Azure AD B2C) provides business-to-customer identity as a service to get single sign-on access to your applications and APIs. This provides an authorization layer for applications hosted behind Application Gateway and Azure Front Door. However, some false positives may occur during the final authentication process. When working on false positives, a good practice is to look out for results with a similar tracking reference. (See Understanding WAF logs).
